channel.title: info on Cheng XU（徐 诚）
channel.description: Recent content in info on Cheng XU（徐 诚）

item.title: Home
item.description:
I am currently with the Microarchitecture and Integrated Circuit Laboratory (MICL), in School of Computer and Communication Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing (USTB).

My research interests are in the areas of wireless localization, statistical inference and collaborative computing methods to drive swarm robots to perform complex tasks autonomously and collaboratively in uncertain environments based on multi-agent collaborative decision making.
